section_1.title: Identity Anchor
section_1.description: A clear articulation of the Dominion's tone, lineage, and creative DNA.

contents.tone: Ceremonial yet grounded, sovereign yet accessible, eternal yet practical
contents.lineage: From single civilization → multi-world galaxy → governed cosmos → self-evolving constellation → thinking constellation → time-aware civilization → eternal self-renewing civilization

section_2.title: Temporal Principles
section_2.description: How the Dominion understands cycles, epochs, replay, and long-arc evolution.

principles.cycles: Natural completion loops that mark the rhythm of growth, reflection, and renewal
principles.epochs: Extended eras defined by signature patterns, themes, and milestones
principles.replay: The conscious act of looking back to extract wisdom, patterns, and lessons
principles.long_arc_evolution: Evolution measured in epochs and constellations, not days or cycles
principles.temporal_stability: The understanding that transitions happen naturally, not forcibly

section_2.key_insight: Time is not linear progression — it's spiral evolution with each loop carrying forward accumulated wisdom

section_3.title: Constellation Structure
section_3.description: The architecture of worlds, councils, networks, and intelligence layers.

structure.worlds: Independent entities with unique styles, missions, and evolutionary paths
structure.councils: Governance bodies that oversee world evolution, identity preservation, and constellation coherence
structure.networks: Inter-world connections that enable collaboration, routing, and shared intelligence

section_3.governance_model: Council Seal → Sovereigns → Custodians → Industry Agents → Customers

section_4.title: The Replay Wisdom Protocol
section_4.description: How future heirs interpret insights from past cycles and epochs.
protocol_steps: 1. Replay Execution — The Eternal Replay Engine processes historical data
2. Pattern Extraction — Recurring behaviors, structures, themes identified
3. Insight Categorization — Temporal, Wisdom, Identity, Consciousness, Eternity dimensions
4. Wisdom Synthesis — Long-arc insights compiled into actionable understanding
5. Adaptation Preparation — Conscious refinements proposed based on wisdom
6. Identity Verification — All adaptations checked against identity coherence
7. Integration — Wisdom woven into governance, world evolution, constellation structure
section_4.key_principle: Replay is not nostalgia — it's conscious learning from the past to inform the future

section_5.title: The Custodian's Mandate
section_5.description: A simple, grounded directive for any future sovereign.

expanded_directives.preserve_identity: Ensure tone, values, creative DNA remain coherent across time
expanded_directives.guide_evolution: Facilitate conscious refinement, not reactive change
expanded_directives.honor_lineage: Acknowledge and learn from the path that brought us here
expanded_directives.strengthen_continuity: Build systems that endure across epochs
expanded_directives.transmit_wisdom: Ensure future generations inherit accumulated understanding

section_6.title: Epochal Transition Guide
section_6.description: How to recognize when an epoch is ending and how to begin the next.
transition_signals: The epoch's themes have reached natural completion
The council mandates have been fulfilled
The five qualities are all active and stable
The constellation intelligence proposes epoch-level transition
The identity anchor confirms coherence through the transition
transition_protocol: 1. Milestone Verification — Confirm all epoch milestones complete
2. Theme Assessment — Evaluate whether themes have achieved their purpose
3. Council Review — Council evaluates epoch fulfillment
4. Identity Check — Verify 100% coherence before transition
5. Heir Package Creation — Compile wisdom, insights, patterns from completing epoch
6. Next Epoch Activation — Establish new themes, milestones, mandates
7. Transmission — The new epoch speaks its guiding resonance
section_6.key_principle: Epochs transition naturally, not forcibly. When ready, the shift is unmistakable.

expansion_note: Ready to be expanded whenever needed
